targets.query:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.flowId =~ /^${FlowID:regex}$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "level","errorCode","version", "_value", "callSite","serviceId","ip","flowId","userId"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with t_start: int(v: r._time)/1000000-600000}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with t_end: int(v: r._time)/1000000+600000}))
|> group()

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vllm_loading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.model =~ /^${Model:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["serviceId"] == "Dispatcher")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with totalTokens: int(v: r.promptTokens)+int(v: r.completionTokens)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["serviceId","totalTokens","_value"])
  |>group()

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vllm_loading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.model =~ /^${Model:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["serviceId"] == "ProSuite")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with totalTokens: int(v: r.promptTokens)+int(v: r.completionTokens)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["serviceId","totalTokens","_value"])
  |>group()

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with totalTokens: int(v: r.promptTokens)+int(v: r.completionTokens)}))

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vllm_loading")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with TotalTokens_: int(v: r.promptTokens)+int(v: r.completionTokens)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","serviceId","TotalTokens_"])
  |> group(columns: ["serviceId"])

panels.description: Percentage of used cache blocks by vLLM.
panels.title: Cache Utilization

panels.description: Number of tokens processed per second
panels.title: Token Throughput

targets.query:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vllm_loading" and r["flowId"] != "")
  |> group(columns: ["flowId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"flowId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: count)

panels.description: Number of requests in RUNNING, WAITING, and SWAPPED state
panels.title: Scheduler State

panels.description: End to end request latency measured in seconds.
panels.title: E2E Request Latency

panels.description: Average response time for questions and answers

targets.rawSql:
select  SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(kcma.create_time,kcmq.create_time))) AS Response_Time_Sum  from km_chat_message_question kcmq 
left join km_chat_message_answer kcma
on kcmq.id  = kcma.que_id
where kcmq.create_time >=  $__timeFrom() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '8 hours' AND kcma.create_time <= $__timeTo()  AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '8 hours'
and LENGTH(kcma.message) != 0 and (score != 1 or score is null )

select count(kcmq.id) AS Question_Count  from km_chat_message_question kcmq 
left join km_chat_message_answer kcma
on kcmq.id  = kcma.que_id
where kcmq.create_time >=  $__timeFrom() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '8 hours' AND kcma.create_time <= $__timeTo()  AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '8 hours'
and LENGTH(kcma.message) != 0 and (score != 1 or score is null )

panels.title: ⏱︎ Average Response Time

panels.description: Distribution of response time for questions and answers

targets.rawSql:
select  (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(kcma.create_time,kcmq.create_time))) AS Response_Time
from km_chat_message_question kcmq 
left join km_chat_message_answer kcma
on kcmq.id  = kcma.que_id
where kcmq.create_time >=  $__timeFrom() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '8 hours' AND kcma.create_time <= $__timeTo()  AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '8 hours'
and LENGTH(kcma.message) != 0 and (score != 1 or score is null ) and (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(kcma.create_time,kcmq.create_time)))>0

panels.title: Response Time Distribution

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "phisonai",
    tag: "serviceId",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "n_log",
    start: v.timeRangeStart,
    stop:v.timeRangeStop
)
list.name: Service

query.query:

v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "phisonai",
    tag: "serviceId",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "n_log",
    start: v.timeRangeStart,
    stop:v.timeRangeStop
)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["flowId"] != "")
  |> group(columns: ["flowId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column: "flowId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({flowId: r.flowId}))
list.label: Flow ID
list.name: FlowID
